instrument_status.comment: NaOh Wash new gaskets primed ok
automatic status update : unwashed for over 28 days
Backflushed lanes 5 and 6. Good flow seen in al lanes. Checked delivery volume ans is 98% of expected. Started wash on FCB as FCA already washing. Check volumes are correct from wash.
NaOH wash performed all volumes were ok
Wash performed by LC2. Volumes ok
automatic status update : unwashed for over 28 days
2 x Rapid NaOH wash primed ok
Completed a full PM to ensure instrument is in spec, optics, temp and fluidics all looking good.
Several tile drop outs, higher error rates, sequence mismatches over 3 runs ( 13083,13084,13117)
Vacuum checked and all ok. This error usually caused by response from vacuum sensor being too slow when polled by software. Vacuum remains constant.
PCB Hardware failure during last run. To be checked before next run
Tilt motors adjusted for optimal focus.
Lost focus after R2 on side A.

ETF failues due to auto tilt and fiducial focus errors. Full tilt and mapping manual re-adjustment carried out. Tested with clustered FC and all good. Tilt images and fiducial focus images look good. Clusters found for both top and bottom surfaces.
Optics adjusted (AG, PH, MB) ETF confirmed OK with HO bead FC and RR clustered FC
NaOH wash performed, dispensed correct volumes.
unable to find problem with FCB
NaOH wash perfomed. dispensed correct volumes.
automatic status update : unwashed for over 28 days
Ebox replaced. All associated parts replaced and qualified.
Stage Error, Y stage moved too quickly during parts of the scan OR bad connection on the trigger from FPGA to camera OR bad camera link.
Electronic backboane of ebox tested to determine fault. Fault attributed to chem and comm board interactions. Replaced boards and retested. All ok. PM completed.
Can this be changed to planned rather than down please?
failing to find clusters on FCB..looks like ramping issue ?
3 consecutive runs on FCA with weaker cluster density in Rapid mode. Also, issues connecting with donoteject drive, as consistantly requires numerous shutdowns until it works

Blockage in 10 port vici centre position. Cleared blockage. Also a small piece of glass between front manifold and FC holder cover was not allowing left side of manifold to raise properly and form good seal. Removed glass. Good seal established. Flow checked and good. SFDC#560233
FCA has no flow across the flow cell.
NaOH wash new gaskets primed ok
Air drawn through rear gasket. Replaced gaskets and backflushed lanes 4+5. Good flow restored and wash restarted.
Backed flushed all lanes on A&B due to flow issues B seems fine after after post wash, A volumes very short
NaOH washed all volumes ok. new gaskets.
NaOH washed ,all volues ok. new gaskets
Fluidics checked, peltier temperatures checked. No fault found.
FCA not sequencing (images stay same) Blockage? FCB intensity drops to zero (lost focus)
NaOH wash peformed. Dispensed corect volumes. Gaskets changed.
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes, gaskets changed.
Restarted software and runs. Error is comms issue that causes run to stop. Runs continuing as expected.
Instrument seems to have errored out with a hardware failure on FCB. Please be aware both FCs are production FCs, and FCA appears to be still running.
Validation run passes Illumina specs. Waiting for in house QC before running.
Upgrade to be completed before next run.
NaOH wash completed, all volumes correct.
Solenoid upgrade complete and tested in spec.
FCA lane 8 slenoid replaced and run resumed.
Please can you check/change the solenoids in lane 8 on FCA as the present run is having surface dropout in lanes 7 & 8. FCA run has been paused.
FCB ... solenoid 8 looks to have failed, which started to effect lanes 6,7, later
Fluidics check out. Delivery test gave 98% expected volume.
Can the fluidics be checked on FCB as the last run was cancelled because of very high phasing (2.466 to 2.733)
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes. Gaskets changed.
NaOH wash performed. Corect volumes dispensed. Gaskets changed.
automatic status update : unwashed for over 28 days
Could you check lane 5 as it appears to have a solenoid/fluidics issue from C137 of its present run. Lanes 5 and 6 lost, lane 7 affected. Run paused.
Clean FCA vici valve, fluidics test in spec. (JW)
Can Vici Valve on FCA please be cleaned please. 0.313-0.445 on read 2 run
Replaced FCA syringe 4. Flow cell mapping done.
Two things. Both FCS have developed a black line down them across all bases, so could you take a look at that. Also could you change FCA syringe 4 as it is starting o leak a bit. Thanks.
Please could you change FCA solenoid 4. Production run on board which has been paused.

Two things. First can you check FCA solenoid 4 and syringe 4 as both may be leaking, and lane 4 has had a fluidics blip on present run. Also both FCS have developed a black line down them across all bases, so could you take a look at that. Thanks.
FCA L6 solenoid to be replaced
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes, gaskets changed
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes. Gaskets changed.
ViciB Replaced with dimple free version. Chiller peltiers changed (DL)
Please could you check the chiller as it is running steady at 10c+.
Vici A replaced. Delivery positions checked and good.
Please can we ave FCA vici valve replaced as cleaned on the 24/9 but prephasing on present run is up to 0.52.
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes gaskets changed.
Clean Vici A&B, replaced soleniod B2, Fluidics test all ok.
Vicci clean on FCA AND FCB. Also, had solenoid failure on FCB mid run. Lane 1 looks to have failed first, then all lanes fail within 2 cycles
solenoids failed on flowcell B. Started on lane one the all lanes dropped out.
Please could we have both vici valves cleaned as FCAs present run has Prephasing up to 0.7 and FCB is up to 0.5.
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes. Gaskets changed.
Checked fluidics and flushed lines. Delivery tests give result of over 98%. No bubbles visible when using water. Possible bubbles being introduced from reagents.
Please could you check/change front manifold and tighten fluidic lines as we are losing swaths on each run on FCB only. Now on C108/208.
NaOH washed, volumes ok, new gaskets on.
NaOH washed, volumes ok, new gaskets on.
NaOH wash performed all volumes ok. New Gaskets.
Backflushed A8 and changed solenoid on B1
Please could you check/change FCA syringe 4 and FCB syringe 2 and 6 as all seen leaking air. Instrument washed and idle.
NaOH Wash new gaskets prime okay
NaOH washed, volumes ok, new gaskets on.
NaOH washed, volumes ok, new gaskes on.
NaOH Wash new gaskets primed ok
NaOH washed, volumes ok, new gaskets on.
Vici FCA cleaned and delivery checked
Please could you clean FCA vici valve as the last two runs have had higher than liked Prephasing values. Now on CR2 prep/208.
fludics lines tightend and gasket replaced. - delivery now OK and no bubbles present.
Please could you investigate the occurance of lots of bubbles at the end of both R1 and R2 on the last run causing heavy swath loss. Now washing.
NaOH wash performed. Dispensed correct volumes.
NaOH wash performed, all volumes correct.
FCB lane 3 has drop in data and air seen in syringe. Please check solenoid. Run now pausing.
